name: infrastack-interview

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:user" "npm run start:product" "npm run start:order"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd microservices/user-service && npm install && cd ../product-service && npm install && cd ../order-service && npm install

author: Muhammed Enes Unal
description: A basic monolith project for generating and visualizing mock OpenTelemetry data.
